DOC.brief_summary: This non-interventional , prospective , multi-centric , cross-sectional study aim observe clinical practice India manage Heart Failure patient & check one year outcome HF patient . A total 5 visit conduct study . There baseline visit follow four follow-up visit ass outcome
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Clinical Epidemiology Patients With Heart Failure ( HF ) India
DOC.detailed_description: A non-interventional , prospective study evaluate clinical epidemiology patient Heart Failure ( HF ) India
DOC.criteria: 1 . Provision subject inform consent 2 . Female male age 18 year 3 . All patient Dyspnea and/or sign systemic congestion 1 . Subjects Current Acute Coronary Syndrome 2 . Absence cardiac disease/structural heart disease
